completed_steps.summary: Classified as monolith with 11 service modules, backend project type, event-driven microservice architecture
Found 14 existing docs in docs/, 1 CI/CD config, no project README. No additional user context.
Tech stack: Python 3.12, Pydantic, asyncpg/PostgreSQL 16, Redis 7, Qdrant, Neo4j 5, Kafka/Redpanda, Anthropic Claude, OIDC+mTLS auth, K8s+GHCR deployment
Deep scan complete: 8 service APIs cataloged, 31 Kafka topics mapped, 30+ PG tables across 7 migrations, 20+ Pydantic schemas, 12 Prometheus alerts, OIDC+mTLS auth, 44-event audit taxonomy
Source tree documented: full annotated tree with 9 critical folders, data flow diagram, entry points marked

Dev setup: pip install -e .[dev], docker-compose for infra, 3 init scripts. CI: GH Actions (PG+Redis, 90% coverage). CD: 8-service matrix build to GHCR. Gaps: no Dockerfile, no Makefile, no CONTRIBUTING.md
Skipped: single-part monolith project, no multi-part integration needed

Architecture reference written: 12 sections covering exec summary, tech stack, data flow, resilience, service catalog, investigation pipeline, LLM routing, data architecture, security, monitoring, dev setup, known gaps
4 supporting documents generated: project-overview.md, development-guide.md, data-models.md, api-contracts.md
Master index.md generated with links to 6 generated docs and 14 existing docs, categorised into 4 sections
Validation and review complete. All checklist items passed. No incomplete markers. No critical issues.

findings.project_classification: Monolith repo, 11 service modules, Python 3.12+, event-driven microservices with polyglot persistence
findings.existing_docs: 14 docs found (3 planning, 5 architecture/design, 2 integration, 4 operations). No project-level README.
findings.technology_stack: Python 3.12 on async microservices, polyglot persistence (PG+Redis+Qdrant+Neo4j+MinIO), Kafka events, Anthropic LLM, OIDC+mTLS auth, K8s prod deployment
findings.api_contracts: 8 services, 31 Kafka topics, inter-service via events + direct async calls
findings.data_models: 30+ PG tables (7 migrations), 20+ Pydantic schemas, immutable audit with hash chain
findings.config_auth: K8s namespace, OIDC+mTLS dual auth, 12 Prometheus alerts, 44-event audit taxonomy
findings.source_tree: Source tree with 9 critical folders, all entry points annotated, data flow mapped
findings.dev_ops: pip editable install, docker-compose infra, GH Actions CI/CD, 90% coverage gate, GHCR images. Gaps: no Dockerfile, no Makefile, no CONTRIBUTING.md
findings.architecture: Architecture reference generated: 12 sections, complements existing architecture.md

resume_instructions: Workflow completed successfully. No resume needed.
